title: 怎么样才能弄有图片的签名
author: woshishui
txt_content: 怎么样才能弄有图片的签名 我4级。。~~~

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content: [img]网络图片或图床图片地址[/img]复制代码

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content: 编辑签名的地方有一个图片，点击，黏贴你的地址，像这样

replies.author: woshishui
replies.txt_content:
